commands.name: az pipelines build tag add
commands.syntax:
az pipelines build tag add --build-id
                           --tags
                           [--detect {false, true}]
                           [--org]
                           [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines build tag delete
commands.syntax:
az pipelines build tag delete --build-id
                              --tag
                              [--detect {false, true}]
                              [--org]
                              [--project]

commands.name: az pipelines build tag list
commands.syntax:
az pipelines build tag list --build-id
                            [--detect {false, true}]
                            [--org]
                            [--project]
